name: filter_numeric_data
description: Filter rows from an Excel or CSV file based on multiple threshold conditions applied to a numeric or datetime column.

file_path.description: Path to the Excel or CSV file to filter.

sheet_name.description: Name or index of the Excel sheet to read. Ignored for CSV files.

column_name.description: The column on which to apply the filtering conditions. Must be numeric or datetime.

thresholds.description: A list of threshold values to apply to the column.

conditions.description: A list of filtering conditions corresponding to the thresholds. Must match in length.

logical_operator.description: Logical operator to combine multiple filter conditions (AND/OR).

save_as.description: Optional path to save the filtered results as a .csv or .xlsx file.
